column1: 20.  Hence,  it  is  clear  that  a  temple  or  vihara  could  possess  sanghika

column2: property, pudgalika property and property which neither is sanghika
nor pudghalika property but could be treated as temple property and
the  present  Buddhist  Temporalities  Ordinance  recognizes  a

temple  as  an 
institution  with 
the 
characteristics  of
corporation  which  could  acquire  and  hold  movable  and  immovable
